name: Asian Cucumber, Celery, and Avocado Salad
description: Cucumbers and celery, intensely flavored with garlic, ginger, and lime juice, are served on top of sliced avocado.
recipeIngredient: 2 English hothouse cucumbers, seeded and thinly sliced
6 garlic cloves, peeled and lightly smashed
1 jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped
1/4 cup fresh lime juice, from  about 4 limes
4 celery stalks, thinly sliced on a sharp bias

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cucumbers, ginger, garlic, jalapeño, salt, sugar, cilantro, lime juice and oil in a large bowl. Let sit at room temperature, stirring every so often, until flavors are combined and mellowed, about 40 minutes.
Fish out the garlic cloves and discard. Add celery and basil and toss well. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt, sugar and lime juice if desired.
Arrange avocado slices on plates and spoon salad and dressing over top.
